item.description:
Hi Trailblazers!  Let's enjoy some live theater in Portsmouth next Saturday night. 96 Tears is playing and looks like a good play.  After the show we'll go check out the night life in Portsmouth.  The show could sell out, so it's a good idea to get tickets in advance--online or by phone.  The Players Ring website is:

http://www.playersring.org/index.php

We'll meet in the lobby at the Players Ring at 7:30.  The show starts at 8:00 and the doors close promptly.  On street parking only, so leave time to find a place to park

 

Post Script Productions presents 96 Tears by Lawrence Hennessy Directed by Cynthia Arsenault

The 1960s brought revolution to America. Even Psychiatry, the slumberous longtime problem child of medicine, joined in with exciting breakthrough medications that promised relief and recovery from mental illness and release from its dreaded institutions. "96 Tears" spotlights one family's struggle not only with mental illness, but also with the arrogance of the entrenched male-dominated culture of that era. It is a daring play that crackles with dark humor...flawlessly acted with an intensity that will transfix you. You'll cry... 96 Tears.

February 18 - March 6
8pm Friday and Saturday, 2pm Sundays.

Go to Box Office for ticket prices and reservations or purchase tickets online
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the lobby--Ask for Trailblazers
item.why: It's great to watch live theater.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Theater Night-The Players Ring
